description:
Located In SoHa (South Harlem), steps away from restaurant row and the NYC subway lines (B,C and the 2,3) This luxury 1 bedroom apartment features a front balcony, rooftop terrace and a gym. It is also minutes away from Central Park.

Very cozy and comfortable

24 hour gym access
Rooftop Terrace (accessible seasonally)

Nearby nightlife and great restaurants

Located near subway lines B,C and 2,3
Minutes away from the metro north railroad
name: Luxury Harlem Getaway with Balcony View
review: She is very nice and the location is very convenient in Harlem! We walked everywhere... great food places near by and some night life.
